item.title: Stock futures edge higher ahead of inflation reports, oil gains after OPEC+ raises output
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures inched higher Sunday, as investors await key inflation reports later this week.

item.title: Bessent dismisses costs of tariffs, but says U.S. would have to give huge refunds if they’re overturned
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Sunday said the U.S. could end up giving massive refunds if the U.S. Supreme Court finds the Trump administration’...

item.title: After my father died, my stepsister transferred assets into her name. Do I have any legal recourse?
item.description: “Since my dad died, I’ve been able to get just one box of personal mementos and some family possessions.”

item.title: OPEC+ agrees to another oil production boost in October
item.description: OPEC+ agreed Sunday to further increase oil production in October, in an ongoing move to regain market share at the expense of prices.

item.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
item.description: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding.”
